example.name: autogen1
example.text: The irony in this novel is that neither man represents a `` safe '' middle-class haven
example.arg: that neither man represents a `` safe '' middle-class haven

example.name: autogen2
example.text: With considerable irony , the case also shows how completely Japan has turned the tables on U.S. business .
example.arg: the case also shows how completely Japan has turned the tables on U.S. business
